\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0016]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Flare>Guido-san, about that medicine you gave me before...

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Flare>When I drink it, I become too disordered...!! I seek
pleasure and lose all sense... I want to refrain from
drinking it because of the side effects!!
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0001]\N<Guido>Heh... then you don't have to drink it.
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0003]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Guido>Yeah, really. But, the efficiency of love will decrease.

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0018]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0003]\N<Guido>The decreased part means we have to make up for it by doing
more to earn love, huh? (laughs) Plus, the side effects
probably reduce the natural absorption of love, so to
replenish the same amount of love, you might have to do many
times more... (laughs)
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0011]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0003]\N<Flare>!! I... I wasn't informed of such side effects!!
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0011]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0001]\N<Guido>Ah, didn't explain that to you, huh? (laughs)

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0011]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Guido>If you keep doing more, going to save your boyfriend will be
delayed, huh? The more it's delayed, the lower his survival
rate will go, right? (laughs) If that's okay with you, you
can stop the medicine... What will you do? (laughs)

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Flare>...I understand... As before... please let me use... the
medicine...
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0016]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Guido>Kukuku... doesn't seem like it's nothing at all (laughs)

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Flare>By the way, where did you get this medicine...? I don't
think the development room can make something this potent...
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0003]\N<Guido>Ah, it's fine, it's fine. Don't worry about that (laughs)
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0015]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Guido>Instead of that, let's do something that feels good♡

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0020]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Flare>(Somehow, gradually, I feel like I'm being remade... I know
I shouldn't go any further... I know, but...)

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0021]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0003]\N<Guido>Kukuku. You've got a nice look on your face, Flare-chan,
huh? (laughs)

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0021]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0003]\N<Flare>Please give me... love...♡ Today too, please bestow your
favor upon Flare...♡
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0021]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0002]\N<Guido>Kukuku. Really, you've become just to my liking.

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0021]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Guido>As expected of the BB Gang's Pure Flame-specific
aphrodisiac. It was worth making you drink it all this time.

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0021]\FFFF[1080Gidou_0000]\N<Flare>...? G-Guido-sama...♡ quickly... please give me your
cock...♡
